channel.title: How to make a ecto-token points system? buying item with token in a shop
channel.description:
i made a dung area where monster drop a token when they die ( token name ecto-token = 4278 ) i wanna make that u can tradde this token to a shops for item ( its cost 2000 ecto-token ) i added everything that i need ( i think ) i got 0 error from compiling i followed 30% of a tut ( they was showing how to make the dung shops ) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,498306.0.html i worked with playerassistant.java, shopassistant.java, actionhandler.java, item.java and shop.cfg did i forgot a place where to work on it?
plz answer and plz help me! :(
if any one wanna help me im ready rep+++ and im fucking dead serious.

item.title: How to make a ecto-token points system? buying item with token in a shop
item.dc:creator: @mickie456 mickie456
item.description:
@mickie456 wrote:

use this and work it out?

		if (c.myShopId == 73) {
			c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " PK points.");
			return;
		}

btw maybe i can help mickie6503 skype me

item.title: How to make a ecto-token points system? buying item with token in a shop
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“cedrick, post:11, topic:434840”]ok ill send you a pm if i get error okay?
thanks, but where i have to work? players.java or playersave.java?

cuz i think ur rigth im trying to add 4278 ( ecto-token ) like a money system but working only for 1 shops
is it possible?[/quote]
You don’t need either of those classes. Players is for defining variables and PlayerSave actually writes the value of those variables to the character file.

You should only use ShopAssistant class for adding a new currency to a particular shop. I’m sorry, but I’ll help you out more when I get home because I’m at school at the moment. Feel free to send me a message if you need any help.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a ecto-token points system? buying item with token in a shop
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Skyro:

You should stop coding and read java, you’ve made about 100 threads this week alone.

Just no. Also, he is asking how to make a shop for this. You will not use the playersave class unless you are trying to save variables and their values to a character file. In this case he is using a coin as a form of currency.

@OP - Please post any errors or what part you are stuck on. I will help you, but I’m not going to spoonfeed you through the entire thing.

Read full topic
